creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Panel of crimson satin damask, large vase pattern in geometric framings of basket-weave. Pattern is not complete, the panel being compose of 9 pieces of varying sizes sewn together. Linen and gold braid edging. Lined, half with yellow linen, half white cotton, both pieced. Some tears mended, others not.
title: Panel
